entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Last Mountain Lake (Sanctuary)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:44 p.m. CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023
